album.title: Golden Record
album.description: Word score x2, but -1 for each vowel.

album.title: Copy
album.description: Each time a letter is used twice, it scores 3x.

album.title: Retro Vinyl
album.description: +1 for each time word has been used before.
UVWXYZ score x2 and occurence x2.

album.title: Favorite Letter
album.description: Word score x2 if it contains letter.
